txt.en: Apply Cúridwan's salve to soil plots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Applied Cúridwan's salve to soil plots afflicted with Lâg Dávrit ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Apply Cúridwan's salve to copses and soil plots afflicted with Lâg Dávrit in Vartúlin.

'This is a large step, [placeholder]. We have created a fortification of nature against the Lâg Dávrit. Soon, we will push these bounds out further and further. The Emerald Wood will once more be real again, not just a memory of old Kinta like me.'
Grove-warden Avadhril asks for your help in spreading Cúridwan's salve throughout Vartúlin.
Applied Cúridwan's salve to copses afflicted with Lâg Dávrit ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'This is quite the blessing Cúridwan has bestowed upon us. We must not waste any of it. You were the one who sought her out and helped heal Vartúlin. It should then be your honour to heal greater Vartúlin.\n\n'There are many soil plots and tree copses throughout Vartúlin. Spread a small but judicious amount of the salve on each. We will use Vartúlin as a staging point to heal greater Adagím. It is my intention to see Laithór, the Emerald Wood, reborn before I leave this place and undergo the Wearying.'
Apply Cúridwan's salve to copses afflicted with Lâg Dávrit ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'This is a large step, [placeholder]. We have created a fortification of nature against the Lâg Dávrit. Soon, we will push these bounds out further and further. The Emerald Wood will once more be real again, not just a memory of old Kinta like me.'
